title: 3000% rally in five years! This multibagger small-cap stock gains 20% as net profit doubles in Q1
shortDesc: Sarda Energy & Minerals' share price surged 20% to ₹527, reaching a 5-month high after reporting a 120% YoY profit increase to ₹437 crore. Revenue rose 76% YoY to ₹1,633 crore, driven by strong performance in energy segment.

title: Jane Street guys are brilliant mathematicians, but we can have PhDs too: Sebi chief
shortDesc: Sebi Chair Tuhin Kanta Pandey defended the regulator’s probe into Jane Street, rejecting claims of overreach and stressing India’s capability. He highlighted the need for structural reforms in the booming derivatives market and emphasized investor protection. Sebi continues to investigate Jane Street’s alleged manipulation of Nifty and Bank Nifty indices.

title: Flysbs Aviation IPO, Day 2: Check Subscription Status, Latest GMP And More
shortDesc: The initial public offering (IPO) of Flysbs Aviation Ltd. continued to witness strong demand across investor categories on the second day of bidding. The BSE SME issue was subscribed nearly 20 times on the second day of bidding, till 1 p.m. on Monday. The Flysbs Aviation IPO received bids for more than 5.8 crore shares against 30.31 lakh shares on offer.

title: RBI to settle $5 billion dollar-rupee swap without rollover, say bankers
shortDesc: The Reserve Bank of India is set to deliver a $5 billion dollar-rupee swap upon its maturity on Monday, a move that will involve selling dollars and absorbing rupees. This action is unlikely to disrupt money markets due to the existing surplus rupee liquidity in the banking system.

title: Why India's heat action plans aren't cooling cities
shortDesc: India faces challenges with extreme heat. Researchers are concerned about inadequate responses. Heat Action Plans exist, but cities often rely on short-term fixes. Long-term solutions lack funding and coordination. Many Indians experience severe heatwaves. The government is allocating more funds for disaster mitigation. Experts emphasize the need for comprehensive strategies. Chennai is using data for urban planning.
